title: States Sue to Undo Changes to Endangered Species Act
text:
WASHINGTON—California and more than a dozen other states sued the Trump administration on Wednesday over regulations that they say have illegally weakened the federal law designed to save wildlife from extinction.

The Trump administration last month put new restrictions on how future assessments for protecting wildlife under the Endangered Species Act are made, including ending a policy that automatically gave the highest level of protection to species listed as threatened even before they were listed as endangered.

...
description: California and more than a dozen other states sued the Trump administration over regulations that they say have weakened the federal law designed to save wildlife from extinction.
